item.title: MicroMentor: Peer-to-Peer Software Help Sessions in Three Minutes or Less
item.description: 著者/所属機関 Nikhita Joshi (Autodesk Research & University of Waterloo) et al. 出典 CHI 2020 (https://nikhitajoshi.ca/micro-mentor) 内容メモ 学習のために1対1のヘルプは価値が高いが，なかなか人を見つけてつないでもらって同期的にや

item.title: Supporting Software Dvelopers' Focused Work on Window-Based Desktops
